description: Try our easy to follow Baked Macaroni recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pasta bake,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Mushroom,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Vegetarian,Spinach,Peanut free
name: Baked Macaroni Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook macaroni in a large pot of boiling salted water until just tender. Drain and cover. Fry mushrooms in a little of the butter until golden. Set aside.
Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Grease 4 x 1 cup ovenproof dishes.

Melt remaining butter in a saucepan. Add the flour and stir over low heat for 1 minute. Remove from heat and gradually add milk, stirring until smooth. Return to the heat and stir for 5 minutes until thickened. Season with nutmeg, salt and pepper.
Stir in egg, ricotta, spinach, mushrooms and cooked pasta. Spoon into dishes. Place on a baking tray, sprinkle with tasty cheese and bake for 20 minutes.
